TheWord.Title: I AM proud to be part of This people.

Remember.ScriptureReference: Exodus 20:12, Exodus 27:9, Numbers 9:18, Numbers 9:19, 2 Chronicles 1:11, 2 Chronicles 26:5, Psalms 72:17, Psalms 91:16, Psalms 104:33, Psalms 116:2, Proverbs 3:2, Proverbs 25:15, John 9:5, Philippians 1:8, James 5:7, 2 Peter 1:13, 2 Peter 2:3

BibleWord.Commentary: Give me now wisdom and knowledge, that I may go out and come in before this people: for who can judge this Your people, that is so great? (2 Chronicles 1:10). For the LORD spoke to me with a strong hand, and instructed me that I should not walk in the way of this people, saying (Isaiah 8:11). For the seed shall be prosperous; the vine shall give her fruit, and the ground shall give her increase, and the heavens shall give their dew; and I will cause the remnant of this people to possess all these things (Zechariah 8:12).

AlphabetSequence.Word: I AM proud to be part of This people.
